languages.text: "Сестра Арджента, скажи мне. Как призвать сердце к смирению, когда его одолевают... ревность и сомнения?"
"Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"
languages.original_text: "Сестра Арджента, скажи мне. Как призвать сердце к смирению, когда его одолевают... ревность и сомнения?"

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: “阿洁塔修女，请告诉我：如果心灵……被嫉妒与猜疑填满，它还要如何保持谦卑？”
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"

traits.locale_text: “阿洁塔修女，请告诉我：如果心灵……被嫉妒与猜疑填满，它还要如何保持谦卑？”
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: « Dites-moi, sœur Argenta : comment faire preuve d'humilité quand on a le cœur empli de... jalousie et de doutes ? »
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"

traits.locale_text: « Dites-moi, sœur Argenta : comment faire preuve d'humilité quand on a le cœur empli de... jalousie et de doutes ? »
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: «Hermana Argenta, dígame: ¿cómo es posible llevar al corazón a la humildad cuando está lleno de... celos y dudas?».
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"

traits.locale_text: «Hermana Argenta, dígame: ¿cómo es posible llevar al corazón a la humildad cuando está lleno de... celos y dudas?».
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、教えてください。嫉妬と疑念に打ちひしがれているとき…どうやって謙虚さを呼び起こすのですか？」
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"

traits.locale_text: 「シスター・アルジェンタ、教えてください。嫉妬と疑念に打ちひしがれているとき…どうやって謙虚さを呼び起こすのですか？」
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: "Schwester Argenta, sagt: Wie ermahnt man das Herz zur Demut, wenn es von ... Eifersucht und Zweifeln zerfressen wird?"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"

traits.locale_text: "Schwester Argenta, sagt: Wie ermahnt man das Herz zur Demut, wenn es von ... Eifersucht und Zweifeln zerfressen wird?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"

languages.text: "Söyle bana Rahibe Argenta: Kıskançlığın, şüphenin pençesine düşmüş gönülleri dindirmenin yolu var mıdır?"
languages.original_text: "Sister Argenta, tell me: how do you call the heart to humility when it is overcome with... jealousy and doubt?"

traits.locale_text: "Söyle bana Rahibe Argenta: Kıskançlığın şüphenin pençesine düşmüş gönülleri dindirmenin yolu var mıdır?"
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion
